name: RI_1_2_Record_Lifespan
title: RI.1.2 Record Lifespan (Header)
purpose: Record Lifecycle Events (Function [RI.1.1](Requirements-PHRSFMR2-RI.1.1.html)) are those required to manage Record Entries in persistent storage over the full course of Record Lifespan (Section [RI.1.2](Requirements-PHRSFMR2-RI.1.2.html)). See Section [RI.1.1](Requirements-PHRSFMR2-RI.1.1.html), Record Lifecycle, for further description.
